row.process:
:BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL !Recuperation du Runid :PSET &RunID# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR()
!Creation d'un fichier csv qu'on va remplir New-Item -ItemType "File" -path D:\Automic\Agents\windows\Temp\CSV_HEAT\&RunID#.csv
:P nbline: &NB_LINE# : SET &NB_LINE# = ADD(&NB_LINE#,1) !On rempli le CSV depuis le fichier VARA :SET &NUMBER# = 1 :WHILE &NUMBER# < &NB_LINE# : SET &LINE# = GET_VAR(VARA.ASO.SHAREPOINT_CREATE@TEMP_TICKETS,&NUMBER# ,1) Add-Content -Encoding unicode D:\Automic\Agents\windows\Temp\CSV_HEAT\&RunID#.csv "&LINE#" !: PRINT Line : &LINE# : SET &NUMBER# = ADD(&NUMBER#,1) !: P NUMBER# : &NUMBER# :ENDWHILE
:DELETE_VAR "VARA.ASO.SHAREPOINT_CREATE@TEMP_TICKETS", "0000000000000001" :P avant sub &NB_LINE# : SET &NB_LINE# = SUB(&NB_LINE#,2) :DELETE_VAR "VARA.ASO.SHAREPOINT_CREATE@TEMP_TICKETS", "&NB_LINE#"
:END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL

row.pre_process: !!set attribut host :PUT_ATT HOST = '&HOST_HEAT#' ! !set attribut login for OS-Agent :PUT_ATT LOGIN = 'LOGIN.DEFAUT' :SET &CONN_USER# = GET_ATT(USERID)!
